name: device-communication-control-request
description: Request parameters for the DeviceCommunicationControl service, used to enable or disable network communication for a BACnet device.

fields.name: time-duration
fields.description: The duration in minutes for which the communication control should remain in effect. Optional.

fields.name: enable-disable
fields.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable communication.

fields.name: password
fields.description: An optional password for authentication. Maximum length of 20 characters.
